data.title: Severe flooding in South claims 25 lives
data.description: Severe flooding in the South has claimed 25 lives and affected more than 660,000 households in 10 provinces, with large areas of six provinces still inundated as the water drains slowly off..

data.title: ThaiBev’s Thapana Honoured as 2024 CEO of the Year
data.description: Annual award conferred by Krungthepturakij and University of the Thai Chamber of Commerce recognises outstanding leadership and strategic vision

data.title: Severe flooding in South has claimed 25 lives
data.description: Severe flooding in the South has claimed 25 lives and affected more than 660,000 households in 10 provinces, with large areas of six provinces still inundated as the water drains slowly off..

data.title: Malaysians return to devastated homes as floodwaters recede
data.description: TUMPAT, Malaysia - Residents in the Malaysian town of Tumpat were returning to submerged homes and shops as deadly floodwaters eased in some areas following the worst floods in decades over the weekend, and more heavy rain was forecast as soon as Tuesday.

data.title: Peter Perfect! Uihlein tops with victory
data.description: Doha: Peter Uihlein proved simply too strong at the US$2.5 million International Series Qatar on Sunday, marching to a five-shot victory at Doha Golf Club.

data.title: Exclusive Enrollment Opportunity at Brighton College Bangkok, Vibhavadi
data.description: As part of our launch celebration for the new    Vibhavadi campus , Brighton College Bangkok is delighted to offer an exclusive opportunity for pupils joining our vibrant educational community.

data.title: NT and Megabangna Collaborate for Mega Countdown Concert
data.description: National Telecom Public Company Limited (NT), in partnership with Megabangna Shopping Centre, is set to create an extraordinary end-of-year celebration with the highly anticipated  “NT PRESENTS MEGA COUNTDOWN 2025” . The event promises to deliver an unforgettable evening of music, entertainment, and joy under the theme  “A Sonic Journey into Mega Pop City” .

data.title: Chaumet Shines Bright at ICONSIAM Grand Opening
data.description: Chaumet officially unveiled its first boutique in Thailand at ICONSIAM with a spectacular Grand Opening ceremony, marking a significant milestone for the esteemed Maison in the Asia-Pacific region.

data.title: PM criticised for being too relaxed in her approach as leader
data.description: Recent comments about her husband hailing from the flood-stricken south have come under fire from fellow politicians

data.title: Dow Leads Mangrove Cleanup, Recycling Over 2.2 Tonnes
data.description: Dow Thailand Group has once again demonstrated its commitment to sustainability with its second annual "Save the Mangroves, Reduce Waste" campaign. The initiative, conducted in collaboration with the Thailand Mangrove Alliance and the Department of Marine and Coastal Resources, brought together government agencies, employees, and over 400 community volunteers to restore mangroves in Rayong Province.

data.title: Thaioil Wins Sustainability Disclosure Award for Sixth Year
data.description: Thai Oil Public Company Limited was recently honoured with the "Sustainability Disclosure Award 2024 – Award of Honour" for the sixth consecutive year. The award ceremony, hosted by the Thaipat Institute, was held at the Auditorium of the Bangkok Art and Culture Centre.

data.title: Thailand wins 3 awards at int’l ophthalmic photography contest
data.description: Technician from Thailand’s leading specialised ophthalmology institute recognised for his photographic talent at Chicago event

data.title: Eastern Aviation City project, U-Tapao airport still on track
data.description: Despite delays caused by incomplete government infrastructure investments., Bangkok Airways reaffirms commitment to the project

data.title: Thai-European free trade deal to bring much-needed boost to economy
data.description: Recently concluded agreement will go a long way to increasing Thailand’s  competitiveness on the global stage, Thai Chamber of Commerce says

data.title: Krungsri, MUFG Boost Regional Growth with ASEAN Link
data.description: Bank of Ayudhya (Krungsri), in partnership with parent company Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group (MUFG) and other regional partner banks, is supporting customers’ business expansion across Southeast Asia to capitalise on the region’s robust growth potential.

data.title: Govt to set up national disaster HQ
data.description: The government has announced plans to establish a national disaster management centre to tackle emergencies amid the ongoing flood crisis which has devastated many parts of the lower South.

data.title: Phumtham downplays MP's House dissolution warning
data.description: Deputy Prime Minister Phumtham Wechayachai dismissed a Pheu Thai MP

data.title: 'Many' suspects in resort land case
data.description: There are many suspects thought to be involved in the case of a luxury resort built on land reserved for landless farmers in Nakhon Ratchasima and Saraburi, said Pol Maj Gen Jaroonkiat Pankaew, deputy commissioner of the Central Investigation Bureau (CIB) yesterday.

data.title: Yingluck next for return?
data.description: The release on parole of former commerce minister Boonsong Teriyapirom, who was convicted of corruption in the rice-pledging scheme, has heightened speculation about a possible return of fugitive former prime minister Yingluck Shinawatra.

data.title: Phuket launches electric buses to ease traffic, air pollution
data.description: Phuket Provincial Administrative Organisation (PAO) on Monday did a test run of its fleet of electric buses, which were bought to alleviate air pollution, reduce traffic congestion and promote smart city development.

data.title: 'Kamen Rider' rides into KL with a 50th-anniversary celebration exhibition
data.description: Fans of Japanese tokusatsu and superhero culture are in for a treat as the Kamen Rider 50 Years Exhibition arrives in Kuala Lumpur. This immersive event celebrates five decades of the iconic franchise, showcasing its cultural impact, technology, and enduring appeal.
